results.definition: proof by a process of argument or a series of proposition proving an asserted conclusion
a visual presentation showing how something works
examples: the lecture was accompanied by dramatic demonstrations
the lecturer shot off a pistol as a demonstration of the startle response

results.definition: a show or display; the act of presenting something to sight or view
examples: he gave the customer a demonstration

results.definition: a public display of group feelings (usually of a political nature)
examples: there were violent demonstrations against the war

results.definition: a show of military force or preparedness
examples: he confused the enemy with feints and demonstrations
